title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4104.5 - Drivers stand
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4104.5 - Drivers stand

State Regulations

Each racing association shall provide a stand located
conveniently to the gate through which horses enter the race track from the
paddock or receiving barn, for the use of drivers scheduled to
race. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4104.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
